General.Name: Minto Metals Corp
General.Description: Minto Metals Corp. engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties in Canada. The company primarily explores for copper, as well as gold and silver. It owns and operates the producing Minto mine property located in the Minto Copper Belt, Yukon. The company is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 5940 Macleod Trail SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2H 2G4

1.Name: Mr. David John Birch CMA, CPA
